experience: You and Nimish both know Sylvia Kubiak, Monica Hatchett, and 8 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
You both worked at Charles Schwab from Nov 2016 to Feb 2017

Responsibilities:•	Working on designs, architecture & development, existing implementation review, troubleshooting, performance and optimization. •	Working on requirement analysis and development of performance management domain back-end applications and web (RESTful) services.•	Multi-threaded Web services and micro-services development using C#, LINQ, .NET 4.6 / 4.5.1, Git, Swagger, JIRA, NLog, dot Trace, Memory and Performance profiler (Jet brains), .NET ReSharper, Visual Studio 2015 and 2017.•	Used SOLID / YAGNI / TDD and REST design principles and practices.

* Extensive design and development of financial transactions, POS and/or fuel management solutions.* Design, implement and deliver high quality solutions on variety of platforms.* Modify and extend existing global payment applications design framework to process EMV card transactions.* Interface with customers and their software developers and integrator.* Working on requirement analysis, design, development and testing of different fuel & payment processing management applications.* Working on multi-threaded windows services and applications development using C#, LINQ, .Net 4.5, Rx Extensions, Task/TPL, RESTful Api, WebServices, JSON.Net, WiX, MTM, VS 2015 on Win 8.1 for POS and Win 10.* Design and developed a Mannatec Front End Processor (FEP) application for electronic payment system (EPS) serving different clients/host-networks like: Chevron, Heartland and First Data.* Worked in Kanban and Agile Programming Methodology (Scrum) to accomplish scheduled targets with quality.

Responsibilities:•  Worked on designs, architecture & development, existing design review, critical engineering, troubleshooting, performance and optimization. •  Worked on requirement analysis of options trading, option strategies (multi-leg) and implementation of Trade ticket, Watch-list and Order Status tools.•  Multi-threaded Desktop (Windows) application development using WPF, C#, LINQ, .NET 3.5 and Visual Studio 2010 (TFS for developers) on Win XP.•  Used MVVM and MVP design patterns for WPF development framework.•  Optimization of Visual tree, rendering and defining UI functions and controls (User-control and custom-control) using XAML and WPF code behind.•  Worked in Agile Programming Methodology (Scrum) to accomplish tighter schedules with quality.

•	Worked on designs & architecture, existing design review, re-factoring, troubleshooting, performance and optimization. •	Multi-threaded Desktop (Windows) application and service development using WPF, WCF, C#, LINQ, .NET 4.0 and Visual Studio 2010 (TFS for developers) on Win 7.•	Using PRISM, Entity Framework, MVPVM, MVVM and MVP design patterns for WPF development work.•	Worked on defining UI functions and controls using XAML.•	Worked in Agile Programming Methodology (Scrum) to accomplish tighter schedules with quality.

Responsibilities:•	Worked on designs, architecture (proof of concepts),  existing design review, critical engineering, troubleshooting, performance and optimization. •	Provided analysis and solutions on possible trade-offs to match business requirements with current tools / technology (WPF/.NET framework etc)•	Worked on multi-threaded Desktop (Windows) application development using WPF, C#, LINQ, .NET 3.5 and Visual Studio 2010 (TFS for developers) on Win XP.•	Used MVVM and MVP design patterns for WPF development work.•	Worked on rendering, defining UI functions and controls using XAML.•	Implemented Automation peer classes for different WPF tools/classes to support Coded UI in VS 2010 and automated testing via QTP.•	Worked in Agile Programming Methodology (Scrum) to accomplish tighter schedules with quality.
